Source.Name: valkey
Source.Summary: Valkey is a high-performance data structure server that primarily serves key/value workloads.
Source.Description: Valkey is an open source (BSD) high-performance key/value datastore that supports a variety of workloads such as caching, message queues, and can act as a primary database. Valkey can run as either a standalone daemon or in a cluster, with options for replication and high availability.
